description: Our girls’ lanyard is perfect for keeping her keys and school ID on hand. A dual-sided release buckle and lobster claw clasp make it easy to detach her items. And an allover pattern is easy to spot in her backpack.
opinions: Our girls’ lanyard is perfect for keeping her keys and school ID on hand. A dual-sided release buckle and lobster claw clasp make it easy to detach her items. And an allover pattern is easy to spot in her backpack.
